Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

open Set Real Filter Topology Polynomial

/--
The polynomials $P_n(x)$ are defined by
\begin{align*}
P_1(x) &= 1 + x, \\
P_2(x) &= 1 + 2x, \\
P_{2n+1}(x) &= P_{2n}(x) + (n + 1) x P_{2n-1}(x), \\
P_{2n+2}(x) &= P_{2n+1}(x) + (n + 1) x P_{2n}(x).
\end{align*}
Let $a_n$ be the largest real root of $P_n(x)$. Prove that $a_n$ is strictly monotonically increasing and tends to zero.
-/
theorem putnam_1978_b3
(P : ℕ+ → Polynomial ℝ)
(hP1 : P 1 = 1 + X)
(hP2 : P 2 = 1 + 2 * X)
(hPodd : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 1) = P (2 * n) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n - 1))
(hPeven : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 2) = P (2 * n + 1) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n))
(a : ℕ+ → ℝ)
(haroot : ∀ n, (P n).eval (a n) = 0)
(haub : ∀ n, ∀ x, (P n).eval x = 0 → x ≤ a n)
: (StrictMono a ∧ Tendsto a atTop (𝓝 0)) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_1978_b3
(P : ℕ+ → Polynomial ℝ)
(hP1 : P 1 = 1 + X)
(hP2 : P 2 = 1 + 2 * X)
(hPodd : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 1) = P (2 * n) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n - 1))
(hPeven : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 2) = P (2 * n + 1) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n))
(a : ℕ+ → ℝ)
(haroot : ∀ n, (P n).eval (a n) = 0)
(haub : ∀ n, ∀ x, (P n).eval x = 0 → x ≤ a n)
: (StrictMono a ∧ Tendsto a atTop (𝓝 0)) := by
  have h₁ := haroot 1
  have h₂ := haroot 2
  have h₃ := haroot 3
  have h₄ := haroot 4
  have h₅ := haub 1 0
  have h₆ := haub 2 0
  have h₇ := haub 3 0
  have h₈ := haub 4 0
  simp_all [hP1, hP2, hPodd, hPeven, Polynomial.eval_C, Polynomial.eval_X, Polynomial.eval_add,
    Polynomial.eval_mul, Polynomial.eval_pow, Polynomial.eval_sub, Polynomial.eval_neg]
  <;> norm_num at *
  <;> nlinarith
```

import Mathlib

open Set Real Filter Topology Polynomial

/--
The polynomials $P_n(x)$ are defined by
\begin{align*}
P_1(x) &= 1 + x, \\

P_{2n+1}(x) &= P_{2n}(x) + (n + 1) x P_{2n-1}(x), \\

\end{align*}
Let $a_n$ be the largest real root of $P_n(x)$. Prove that $a_n$ is strictly monotonically increasing and tends to zero.
-/
theorem putnam_1978_b3
(P : ℕ+ → Polynomial ℝ)
(hP1 : P 1 = 1 + X)
(hP2 : P 2 = 1 + 2 * X)
(hPodd : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 1) = P (2 * n) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n - 1))
(hPeven : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 2) = P (2 * n + 1) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n))
(a : ℕ+ → ℝ)
(haroot : ∀ n, (P n).eval (a n) = 0)
(haub : ∀ n, ∀ x, (P n).eval x = 0 → x ≤ a n)
: (StrictMono a ∧ Tendsto a atTop (𝓝 0)) :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_1978_b3
(P : ℕ+ → Polynomial ℝ)
(hP1 : P 1 = 1 + X)
(hP2 : P 2 = 1 + 2 * X)
(hPodd : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 1) = P (2 * n) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n - 1))
(hPeven : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 2) = P (2 * n + 1) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n))
(a : ℕ+ → ℝ)
(haroot : ∀ n, (P n).eval (a n) = 0)
(haub : ∀ n, ∀ x, (P n).eval x = 0 → x ≤ a n)
: (StrictMono a ∧ Tendsto a atTop (𝓝 0)) := by
  have h₁ := haroot 1
  have h₂ := haroot 2
  have h₃ := haroot 3
  have h₄ := haroot 4
  have h₅ := hPodd 1
  have h₆ := hPeven 1
  have h₇ := hPodd 2
  have h₈ := hPeven 2
  have h₉ := hPodd 3
  have h₁₀ := hPeven 3
  norm_num [hP1, hP2, hPodd, hPeven, Polynomial.eval_C, Polynomial.eval_X, Polynomial.eval_add, Polynomial.eval_mul, Polynomial.eval_pow] at *
  <;>
    (try norm_num) <;>
    (try linarith) <;>
    (try nlinarith) <;>
    (try ring_nf at *) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1), sq_nonneg (a 2), sq_nonneg (a 3), sq_nonneg (a 4)]) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 2), sq_nonneg (a 2 - a 3), sq_nonneg (a 3 - a 4)]) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 3), sq_nonneg (a 2 - a 4)]) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 4)])
  <;>
    (try simp_all [StrictMono, tendsto_atTop_atTop]) <;>
    (try nlinarith) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1), sq_nonneg (a 2), sq_nonneg (a 3), sq_nonneg (a 4)]) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 2), sq_nonneg (a 2 - a 3), sq_nonneg (a 3 - a 4)]) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 3), sq_nonneg (a 2 - a 4)]) <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 4)])
  <;>
    (try linarith)
  <;>
    (try nlinarith)
  <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1), sq_nonneg (a 2), sq_nonneg (a 3), sq_nonneg (a 4)])
  <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 2), sq_nonneg (a 2 - a 3), sq_nonneg (a 3 - a 4)])
  <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 3), sq_nonneg (a 2 - a 4)])
  <;>
    (try nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a 1 - a 4)])
  <;>
    (try simp_all [StrictMono, tendsto_atTop_atTop])
  <;>
    (try nlinarith)
```

import Mathlib

open Set Real Filter Topology Polynomial

/--
The polynomials $P_n(x)$ are defined by
\begin{align*}
P_1(x) &= 1 + x, \\
P_2(x) &= 1 + 2x, \\
P_{2n+1}(x) &= P_{2n}(x) + (n + 1) x P_{2n-1}(x), \\
P_{2n+2}(x) &= P_{2n+1}(x) + (n + 1) x P_{2n}(x).
\end{align*}
Let $a_n$ be the largest real root of $P_n(x)$. Prove that $a_n$ is strictly monotonically increasing and tends to zero.
-/
theorem putnam_1978_b3
(P : ℕ+ → Polynomial ℝ)
(hP1 : P 1 = 1 + X)
(hP2 : P 2 = 1 + 2 * X)
(hPodd : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 1) = P (2 * n) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n - 1))
(hPeven : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 2) = P (2 * n + 1) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n))
(a : ℕ+ → ℝ)
(haroot : ∀ n, (P n).eval (a n) = 0)
(haub : ∀ n, ∀ x, (P n).eval x = 0 → x ≤ a n)
: (StrictMono a ∧ Tendsto a atTop (𝓝 0)) :=

theorem putnam_1978_b3
(P : ℕ+ → Polynomial ℝ)
(hP1 : P 1 = 1 + X)
(hP2 : P 2 = 1 + 2 * X)
(hPodd : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 1) = P (2 * n) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n - 1))
(hPeven : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 2) = P (2 * n + 1) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n))
(a : ℕ+ → ℝ)
(haroot : ∀ n, (P n).eval (a n) = 0)
(haub : ∀ n, ∀ x, (P n).eval x = 0 → x ≤ a n)
: (StrictMono a ∧ Tendsto a atTop (𝓝 0)) := by
  have h₁ := haroot 1
  have h₂ := haroot 2
  have h₃ := haroot 3
  have h₄ := haroot 4
  have h₅ := haub 1 0
  have h₆ := haub 2 0

  <;>
    nlinarith

theorem putnam_1978_b3
(P : ℕ+ → Polynomial ℝ)
(hP1 : P 1 = 1 + X)
(hP2 : P 2 = 1 + 2 * X)
(hPodd : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 1) = P (2 * n) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n - 1))
(hPeven : ∀ n, P (2 * n + 2) = P (2 * n + 1) + C ((n : ℝ) + 1) * X * P (2 * n))

(haub : ∀ n, ∀ x, (P n).eval x = 0 → x ≤ a n)
: (StrictMono a ∧ Tendsto a atTop (𝓝 0)) := by
  have h1 := haroot 1
  have h2 := haroot 2
  have h3 := haroot 3
  have h4 := haroot 4
  have h5 := haub 1 0
  have h6 := haub 2 0
  have h7 := haub 3 0
  have h8 := haub 4 0

  <;> norm_num at *
